doctor.name: Dr. Ariful Haque
doctor.info: Dr. Ariful Haque is a Cancer Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Oncology). He is a Resident Surgeon, Radiotherapy at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shimla Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Ariful Haque at Shimla Hospital, Pabna is 9am to 4pm (Only Friday).

chamber.address: Shimla Tower, Thana Mor, Hospital Road, Pabna

doctor.name: Dr. Sheikh Nazmul Karim
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Sheikh Nazmul Karim is a Cancer Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Oncology). He is a Consultant, Oncology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shafique Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Sheikh Nazmul Karim at Shafique Hospital, Pabna is 9am to 5pm (Only Friday).

chamber.address: Khairul Tower, Narikel Bagan Road, Kalachad Para, Pabna
